c74object.name: mb.drumrack~
c74object.digest: Drum rack is combination of three synthisized drum sounds based on the Roland TR-808 and 909 drum machines.

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event. Drum timbres are evenly split in the notes of each octave.

method.name: kickGain
method.digest: The volume of the kick drum

method.name: kickResonance
method.digest: How wet or dry the kick drum will sound

method.name: kickPitch
method.digest: The relitive pitch of the kick drum

method.name: snareResonance
method.digest: How wet or dry the snare drum will sound

method.name: snarePitch
method.digest: The relitive pitch of the snare drum

method.name: hihatResonance
method.digest: How wet or dry the hihat will sound

method.name: hihatPitch
method.digest: The relitive pitch of the hihat

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
